definitions.definition: a representation of the external form of a person or thing in art.
examples: likeness, resemblance; Moredepiction, portrayal, representation; statue, statuette, sculpture, bust, effigy; painting, picture, portrait, drawing, sketch "an image of St. Bartholomew"Moredepiction, portrayal, representation; statue, statuette, sculpture, bust, effigy; painting, picture, portrait, drawing, sketch an image of St. Bartholomew

definitions.definition: a visible impression obtained by a camera, telescope, microscope, or other device, or displayed on a computer or video screen.
examples: picture, photograph, snapshot, photo images of the planet Neptune

definitions.definition: an optical appearance or counterpart produced by light or other radiation from an object reflected in a mirror or refracted through a lens.
examples: reflection, mirror image, likeness he contemplated his image in the mirror

definitions.definition: a point or set formed by mapping from another point or set.
an exact copy of a computer's hard disk, made for backing up data or setting up new machines.

examples: he had an image of Uncle Walter throwing his crutches away
synonyms: semblance "the image of this country as democratic"

definitions.definition: a person or thing that closely resembles another.
examples: he's the image of his father
synonyms: carbon copy; archaicsimilitude "I'm the image of my grandfather"

examples: he uses the image of a hole to describe emotional emptiness

definitions.definition: the general impression that a person, organization, or product presents to the public.
examples: she strives to project an image of youth
we are made in the image of God
idol, icon, fetish, totem a graven image

definitions.definition: make a representation of the external form of.
make a visual representation of (something) by scanning it with a detector or electromagnetic beam.
examples: every point on the Earth's surface was imaged by the satellite

definitions.definition: make an exact copy of (a computer's hard disk).
examples: the hard disk drive should be imaged using a specialized bitstream backup product

definitions.definition: form a mental picture or idea of.
examples: it is possible for us to image a society in which no one committed crime
synonyms: see in one's mind's eye "she imaged imposing castles"
